name: GitHubTagCommit
description: Adds a git tag to the specified SHA commit using the GitHub API
author: Andrew Hoefling

inputs.name: githubRepo
inputs.label: GitHub Repository Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the GitHub Repository without the organization or owner name. eg: GitHub-AzureDevOps-Tasks

inputs.name: githubOrganization
inputs.label: GitHub Organization Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the GitHub Organization. eg: HoeflingSoftware

inputs.name: githubToken
inputs.label: GitHub Personal Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Personal Access Token for the GitHub Accoung. https://help.github.com/articles/creating-a-personal-access-token-for-the-command-line/

inputs.name: tagName
inputs.label: Tag Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the tag. ex: v1.0.0

inputs.name: tagMessage
inputs.label: Tag Message
inputs.helpMarkDown: The message of the git tag

inputs.name: taggerName
inputs.label: Commit Tag - Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name to display in source control

inputs.name: taggerEmail
inputs.label: Commit Tag - Email
inputs.helpMarkDown: The email to display in source control

inputs.name: taggerDate
inputs.label: Commit Tag - Date
inputs.helpMarkDown: The date to display in source control
